jobDescription: GSN Games, the leading developer in mobile and social games, is seeking a Senior Product Manager with a passion for optimizing user acquisition of world-class mobile games to join our casual games studio based in Palo Alto and San Francisco. About the GSN Casual Games Studio: Our studio consists of a talented group of game artists, designers, engineers, product people and marketers who craft industry-leading mobile games providing very high quality experiences. This studio is the home of Solitaire Tripeaks by GSN, the #1 revenue solitaire game on mobile that has quickly grown into one of the top grossing games on both iOS and Android. What You’ll Do: As a key member of our studio’s Performance Marketing team, your interest and success will be growth of our most valuable players, and all the ways we might acquire them - including traditional UA, but also platform feature opportunities, international, viral flows, ASO, and in-game improvements - whatever can be identified and prioritized as the best opportunities for growing our payer base.  You’ll drive analysis, modeling and strategies around new players for our studio’s games, and inform the strategy framework for our studio’s User Acquisition team to do their thing. You’ll also provide the focus, processes and market knowledge to ensure that our UA efforts have clear goals that are aligned with our early player experiences, clearly communicated throughout the studio and organization, and embody a culture of learning and improving. This is a unique opportunity to be the primary driver in evolving a multi-million dollar per month growth strategy for one of the fastest growing games at scale in the app store.  Our ideal candidate has intensive, hands-on experience doing user acquisition at volume, with experience at an agency - or even better, a high-performing game company - that spends millions of dollars a month per product, but now you’re looking to use your experience to have an impact on setting priorities, identifying the right goals and helping ensure both our UA and product teams are going the right direction. You know how to use your instincts to get to the best jumping-off point, but you’ve learned to embrace data that tells you what’s *really* effective. Responsibilities include:Propose, evaluate, lead and iterate growth and acquisition strategies.Review data and leverage analytics to find new opportunities outside and inside the game to maximize our Founded in 1999, the company has evolved into one of the world’s top game publishers and creators. Its collection of social casino games includes GSN Casino and Bingo Bash, both top 10 grossing iPad apps, as well as Wheel of Fortune Slots: The Ultimate Collection, Solitaire TriPeaks, Mirrorball Slots, Fresh Deck Poker and more.
